26#pragma once
27
28#if ENABLE(NETWORK_CACHE_STALE_WHILE_REVALIDATE)
29
30#include "NetworkCache.h"
31#include "NetworkCacheEntry.h"
32#include "NetworkCacheSpeculativeLoad.h"
33#include <wtf/CompletionHandler.h>
34#include <wtf/WeakPtr.h>
35
36namespace WebCore {
37class ResourceRequest;
38};
39
40namespace WebKit {
41
42class SpeculativeLoad;
43
44namespace NetworkCache {
45
46class AsyncRevalidation : public CanMakeWeakPtr<AsyncRevalidation> {
47 WTF_MAKE_FAST_ALLOCATED;
48public:
49 enum class Result {
50 Failure,
51 Timeout,
52 Success,
53 };
54 AsyncRevalidation(Cache&, const GlobalFrameID&, const WebCore::ResourceRequest&, std::unique_ptr<NetworkCache::Entry>&&, std::optional<NavigatingToAppBoundDomain>, CompletionHandler<void(Result)>&&);
55 void cancel();
56
57 const SpeculativeLoad& load() const { return *m_load; }
58
59private:
60 void staleWhileRevalidateEnding();
61
62 std::unique_ptr<SpeculativeLoad> m_load;
63 WebCore::Timer m_timer;
64 CompletionHandler<void(Result)> m_completionHandler;
65};
66
67} // namespace NetworkCache
68} // namespace WebKit
69
70#endif // ENABLE(NETWORK_CACHE_STALE_WHILE_REVALIDATE)
